title: Lars Vilks, controversial Swedish cartoonist, dead in a car crash
content:
1. Lars Vilks, controversial Swedish cartoonist, dead in a car crash  The Washington Post
  2. Threatened Swedish artist reportedly dead in road accident  Yahoo News
  3. Swedish artist Lars Vilks, who stirred worldwide controversy in 2007 with drawings of the Prophet Mohammad, was killed in a car crash, police said.  NBC News
  4. Lars Vilks: Swede who lived under police protection after drawing Prophet Muhammad dies in crash  euronews
  5. Swedish Prophet Muhammad cartoonist killed in car crash  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 物議を醸したスウェーデンの漫画家、Lars Vilks氏が自動車事故で死亡
